title: Cozy 2 bedroom Apartment for rent
description:
Welcome home to this newly renovated 2 bed 1 bath townhouse featuring brand new electric, plumbing, and central air. Walk into a bright open layout containing new bamboo hardwood floors, a finish brick wall, and recessed led lights. Walk further back and cook in your brand new kitchen containing new white shaker cabinets, and quartz countertops. Out back you have a featured grilling space to BBQ and have your small dog hang out. Downstairs is a half finished basement with tons of storage space and your essential washer and dryer hooked up. When you go upstairs you will walk into your new master bathroom. Next to it will be a small room/den, or office space. At last we are at the master bedroom, a great sized room filled with sunlight gleaming inside and your essential stainless steel fan hanging over your head. Welcome!

title: Wonderful opportunity to live in the historic landmark Colannade Build
description:
Wonderful opportunity to live in the historic landmark Colannade Building! Built in 1932 as a The Wills Eyes Institute, today is has blossomed into a beautiful condo conversion with modern amenities including a doorman, secured entrance, and a gorgeous atrium that is currently under renovation with a world class designer. This is moderate sized boutique building is home to 115 units. Unit 409 is newly renovated with state of the art finishes. Stainless steel appliances, gorgeous warm chestnut cabinets with built in diamond wine rack and glass bar. onyx granite counters with flecks of gold. Venetian stone backsplash with gilded rope details with an elaborate crystal chandelier over kitchen island. Blonde kitchen floor tiles. Maple hardwood floors in living area and bedroom with nice size closets and windows for plenty of natural light. Custom designer paint throughout. Enter into the master bath with Venetian stone tile with sea glass accents and custom vanity mirror with Frigidaire stackable washer dryer. Building is equipped with a fitness room and storage area in basement. Walking distance to essentially everything Philly has to offer. Subway, bus lines, 76, 95, Center City, Kelly Drive area cafes, music venues, restaurants, fitness centers, boot camps and crossfit. You want it, we got it! This lovely home can come partially furnished with two comfortable leather couches, small dining table and fully stocked kitchen (utensils, pots/pans, etc.) for 50 more a month.
1601 Spring Garden St #409

description:
NEW kitchen, appliances and new paint! Must see in Wash West! Top-floor, tri-level apartment, with outdoor space! This 1-bed (with additional loft), 1-bath unit is the perfect match for city living while working from home. Your main floor welcomes you in with an entryway, living room, and kitchen with new appliances, cabinets and granite counters. title: Enjoy luxurious newer construction in Naval Square
description:
Showings start December 1st! Enjoy luxurious newer construction in Naval Square, Center City's premiere gated community in close proximity to South Street Bridge, Fitler Square, Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill River Park, UPENN, CHOP and HUP. This spacious condo with 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths and 1 dedicated parking space in the heated underground garage is in meticulous condition, has been freshly painted and features an open floor plan with high ceilings, new hardwood floors, large windows with new window treatments, ceiling fans, and recessed lighting throughout. Large living room has Juliet balcony with view of the gorgeous pool, trees and green space. Kitchen features cherry cabinets, pantry, granite counters, stainless appliances, gas range and a raised breakfast bar. Spacious master bedroom offers two closets, tiled shower, granite counters and a large soaking tub. Additional features include spacious second bedroom, second upgraded full bath, washer and dryer, foyer closet and linen closet. Located in the newer Pemberton Manor, a quiet, well maintained building with underground heated parking garage with storage space, this unit is literally next door to the pool, gym and dance/yoga studio with private access exclusively for Pemberton residents... it's like having your own personal fitness center! HVAC maintenance plan, water, sewer, trash and all the amenities are included. No smoking, no pets allowed.
800 Admirals Way #1802

title: RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BED, 1 BATH CORNER UNIT, WITH 2-CAR PARKING!
description:
Tucked away in Philly's vibrant Queen Village neighborhood, 830 S Howard St #2 is a recently renovated 2 bed, 1 bath corner unit, with 2-car parking, sat on the top level of a duplex. An idyllic courtyard, with gardens and picnic seating, welcomes you at the front of the building. Inside the unit, soaring cathedral ceilings and new luxury flooring frame the bright and airy living room. This space is filled with natural light from 3 windows and a skylight, while a 4th window brightens the separate dining area. The kitchen is fitted with new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and plenty of cabinet & counter space. There's also room for extra storage or a small table. Down the hall, you'll find a sleek full bathroom adorned with modern fixtures, a glass-enclosed shower, and an updated vanity. Completing the unit are two spacious bedrooms. The primary bedroom has a wet-bar and a pair of sliding doors leading to a Trex deck spanning the unit's width. The building's shared laundry area is on the ground floor, along with an entry from this unit's one garage parking spot and one driveway spot. 830 S Howard's fantastic Queen Village location earns a Walk Score of 93! Nearby South St features markets, restaurants, and cafes, including Whole Foods, ACME, Good Karma, and Bridget Foy's. South of Washington Ave, neighborhood favorites Herman's Coffee, Charlie's Roast Pork, and Pennsport Beer Boutique line E Moyamensing Ave. Shot Tower playground & rec center and Jefferson Sq Park are a few blocks away, plus Target, Acme, Wine & Spirits, Ikea, and Lowes are close by. There's also easy access to public transit, Old City, I-95, and South Jersey via I-76. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!

title: Stunning modeled one bedroom apartment.
description: A cozy condominium in the heart of Washington Square- enjoy historic, tree-lined blocks of eclectic houses dotted with cafes, shops, and nightlife! Enter off of Spruce Street via a marble vestibule, and continue to the main stair. Pass elegant historical details that reveal the building’s storied life before arriving. Open the door into a brilliantly sunny space. Hardwood floors lead to large, south-facing windows with charming shelves. This large living space is open to the kitchen, which offers a brand new refrigerator, gas range, dishwasher, and stone counters. You’ll find ample storage in a long coat closet and space to install a stackable washer/dryer. The full bath offers a tub and vanity surround. Just beyond, the bedroom overlooks the quiet breezeway, where you can peek out for metropolitan views and diffuse northern light. Hardwood floors extend to this room, and a large closet awaits your wardrobe. Quiet and high above Spruce Street, you can find classic Center City bars and restaurants within a few steps. Turn the corner to find Jefferson University or the bus & Broad Street Line.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with City Skyline View, Pets Welcome
description:
The studio apartment home at 2307 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 23rd floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, nail salons, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Maxx's Produce, Spruce Food Market, and Sprouts. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, Friday Saturday Sunday, a.kitchen + bar, Her Place, Vernick Food & Drink, The Dandelion, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Giorgio on Pine. Grab a cup of coffee at J'aime French Café. Relax with a manicure at Naturale, Prestige, and Coco Blue Spruce. Shop at the weekly farmer's market along the beautiful park at Rittenhouse Square every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by community, so the monthly cost is separate.
Our community amenities are amazing! We have a package room, resident lounge, top-of-the-line fitness center, yoga studio, sauna, dog spa, guest suites, and bicycle storage. Plus, we are renovating the roof deck!

* Anthropologie

Price posted is for the 22 month lease term. Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

description: Welcome to this upgraded ranch home in desirable of Blue Bell Springs which offers downsizers the ease of living with single-family ranchers with attached garages and low taxes without the hassle of grass cutting and snow removal! This popular Nantucket model resale features stone on the front of the garage, beautiful cherry cabinetry and stainless steel appliances in the generous kitchen with an eat-in sunny breakfast nook area. Walk into the open-concept Living and Dining Rooms, perfect for entertaining guests, or your new Blue Bell Springs neighbors! Down the hallway, there is a master bedroom, and a 2nd bedroom which could be used as a den/office, study, or bedroom for overnight guests. Medroom have large walk-in closets, and the master has a large master bath with double vanity and oversized shower. There is also a convenient laundry room off of the main hallway which leads to an inviting sunroom that looks out at the peaceful green backyard. During the summertime, relax and enjoy a BBQ on the patio. Conveniently located in beautiful Blue Bell with shopping, golf, a swim club and the Montgomery County Community College close by. Blue Bell Springs is located on forty acres of property bordered by mature woodlands, a stream and two naturally occurring ponds. This recently updated home is turn-key ready for you to move right in!

title: Treat yourself to luxury! 3 bed 3 bath bi-level Brewerytown apt!
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

description:
13 MONTH LEASE AVAILABLE WITH 1 MONTH FREE. Available for JANUARY 1 are brand new 1 bedroom units of varying sizes (5 UNITS REMAINING IN THIS 15 UNIT BUILDING). The photos in this listing are for unit 10 which is one of the balcony units. This is the latest project from the design team at A-Frame Constructs, the people behind Martha, Sally, The Lunar Inn, Tiny's bottle Shop, Zig-Zag BBQ, Pizza Shackamaxon, plus many design driven residential properties.
This is the old Krakus Market building, beautifully renovated with a 2 story addition. The Krakus apartments are simply and thoughtfully designed to be cozy and comfortable. All units have ample closet / storage space with a few units having walk-in closets. All units have soaking tubs. 4 of the units have private balconies, but all units have access to a shared outdoor space and a common lounge area. Unit 1 is wheelchair accessible. Please see below for a list of amenities and individual unit size / price info. Please note listing photos are from multiple units, and each unit has slight variations in layout / design.
Located on the main strip of Port Richmond and within a block or 2 of Reanimator Coffee, Lunar Inn Bar/Restaurant, Tiny's Bottle Shop, Launderette Records to name a few. Many other cool shops / restaurants are just a few blocks away and Tacconelli's Pizzeria and Somerset Splits are a 5-10 minute walk. Some great Polish dining and markets are just around the corner on Allegheny Avenue as well. 1 minute drive to the 95 on-ramp, 10 minute drive to center city, 5 minute drive to Fishtown. Richmond Street has recently undergone an amazing transformation, and soon the Girard Avenue trolley that currently completes it's route in Fishtown will be making stops along Richmond Street. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Gorjana, Paper Source, and Philadelphia Runner. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Pietro's, a.kitchen, The Dandelion, and The Love. Savor a cup of coffee at Ultimo, Elixr, and J'aime French Café. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop for fresh flowers and seasonal produce at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday. There is so much to do in this area!

* Package lockers by Luxer One

* Guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge at the front desk

* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.

* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not managed by community and the cost is separate.
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Online resident portal for maintenance requests, rent payments, and more
Nearby Grocery Stores:
